text: Hoek van Holland Haven (Hook of Holland Harbour) is a railway station in the Netherlands. Trains used to connect with the Stena Line Dutchflyer boat service to Harwich International in England. This station is being converted into the Rotterdam Metro. Buses replace trains. Category:Railway stations in the Netherlands Category:1893 establishments in Europe Category:1890s establishments in the Netherlands
title: Hoek van Holland Haven metro station
